longDesc: Power your retail business with the flexible and user-friendly Lightspeed Retail POS, a cloud-based solution made for retailers of all sizes. Benefit from a wide range of services including customer tracking, inventory management, and sales reporting. Sell both online and offline with ease, thanks to the integrated eCommerce functionality.

features.description: Inventory management helps you keep track of your stock making sure you are never low on products
With Lightspeed Retail, you can sell your goods in-person, online, or through mobile platforms
Offers 24/7 support so regardless of what time an issue may occurr, Lightspeed is there to help'
User-friendly - no intense training needed so you can start using it immediately
